creditline: Courtesy of the artist and Goodman Gallery, South Africa
description: black and white photograph of a rocky hillside with a patch of grass containing several toppled crosses; power lines and factory in the background along left edge
title: On 16 August 2012 South African Police shot striking mineworkers of the Lonro platinum mines, killing 34 and wounding 78. Many of the casualties occurred here, on and around this koppie. Marikana, North-West Province.
